name: typescript-monorepo
dev: pnpm exec --parallel --filter "{apps}^..." -- pnpx ttsc -b tsconfig.build.json && pnpm run dev --parallel --filter {apps}

scripts.build-necessary-libs: pnpm exec --parallel --parseable --filter "{shared}[$(git rev-parse HEAD)]" --filter "{apps}[$(git rev-parse HEAD)]^..." -- pnpx ttsc -b --verbose tsconfig.build.json
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm build-necessary-libs && pnpm run test:e2e --parallel --parseable --filter "...@my/*[$(git rev-parse HEAD)]" --test-pattern="**/*.spec.ts"
